description: Generalized nim sum n + n + n in base 10; carryless multiplication 3 X n base 10.
links: David Applegate, Marc LeBrun and N. J. A. Sloane, Carryless Arithmetic (I): The Mod 10 Version.
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
crossrefs: Cf. A001477 for carryless 1 X n, A004520 for carryless 2 X 10 base 10, A008592 for carryless 10 X n.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 19 2001
